title: Suggest some Junglers pls
body:
So as it goes, at the moment, my Jungle pool is like, Gragas and Jarvan... I kinda never win with Gragas doe.

Jarvan I'm quite fine at, he's my go-to Full tank or AD Bruiser.

But I need an AP Jungler, and I have no clue who to play. Give me someone easy pls. Maybe one that's both tanky and does damage and one full damage?

replies.body: diana, zac, amumu, kayle and elise. try them out
But Elise isn't easy.... Is she?
shes not easy but worth a try if u want a challenge
I don't really enjoy Jungling all that much so I just wanted someone easy going haha

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EHLQT7rR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-18T14:35:56.124+0000)
>
> diana, zac, amumu, kayle and elise. try them out

What this guy said. Also Cho for fun ;-)

Sejuani.

Honestly not sure why more people don't play her.

{{item:1409}}+{{item:2032}}  > {{item:3083}} 

At this point your unkillable in most scenarios, and still do a crapload of damage through your W

Flex-pick the rest of your items based on your enemy team and what your required to do, just try to focus on items that have some form of health.

Oh and btw take 12/0/18, and make sure you take Grasp of the Undying.

I know hes not full ap but {{champion:24}} Jungle is pretty strong at the moment, {{item:3931}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}} with Fervor keystone is STRONK. of course practice with {{champion:24}} first learn how to gank effectively ie: dont use your gap closer to open etc.

I kinda only play the tanky Ap junglers so im not sure if you will like them. Rammus is really good right now, Not sure if Sejuani is good. For full damage AP jungler who is also a little tanky try Diana. Mundo is good now too and he does a lot of damage while going full tank. Maokai is good too but he can't really carry a game by himself. Other than that im pretty sure Nautilus is good right now too. Honestly we are pretty much back to the tank meta so playing tanks in the jungle will probably be the best for the current meta. Ap mages are kinda weak right now because of the nerf to ap items and buffs to MR items, so if you are going to play an AP jungler it is probably better to play a tanky one with a lot of CC who is good at ganking because games end pretty quick right now and ganking junglers will help snowball the game. Oh yeah, Tahm kench and Volibear is really good too, they both have really good clears and Tahm kench ganks aren't bad and volibear is really good at ganking.
